Install LCZ4r in RStudio

Max Anjos

December 01, 2024

Source: vignettes/instalation_lcz4r.Rmd
instalation_lcz4r.Rmd

üóÉÔ∏è Installation in R

To install R package LCZ4r LCZ4r use the development version on GitHub with latest features.

if(!require(remotes)) install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("ByMaxAnjos/LCZ4r", upgrade = "never")
#Load functions from LCZ4r package
library(LCZ4r)

The upgrade = ‚Äúnever‚Äù in the install_github indicates that package dependencies won‚Äôt be upgraded. If you want, replace ‚Äúalways‚Äù. In this case, the installing processing may take a few minutes.
